drag-and-drop: Drag and drop file here to {breakLine}upload or
drop-to-add: Drop to add more files or
discard-changes-body: There are still files uploading. Are you sure want to abort uploading?
not-supported-file: {fileName} not allowed file type, please select file with one of the following types {allowedTypes}
files-limit: You can only select up to {limit} files
file-limit: You can only select up to {limit} file
